title: samcrypto
author: samcrypto
content: We all know what happened to LUNA last year, and despite of that meron paren ang naghahype sa LUNC especially now that they are planning to increase the burning system with a help of Binance. I have a few LUNC bought during the panic but got trap on this.Now My question is, meron pa bang pagasa si LUNC to reach $1 or malaking hype lang ito? Sino dito ang naghohold paren ng LUNC and ano ang prediction mo dito?

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Quote from: samcrypto on February 12, 2023, 12:45:35 PMWe all know what happened to LUNA last year, and despite of that meron paren ang naghahype sa LUNC especially now that they are planning to increase the burning system with a help of Binance. I have a few LUNC bought during the panic but got trap on this.Now My question is, meron pa bang pagasa si LUNC to reach $1 or malaking hype lang ito? Sino dito ang naghohold paren ng LUNC and ano ang prediction mo dito? Nope. Hinding hindi na yan aabot sa $1. Sobrang laking crypto scandal ang meron sa coin na  yan at yung mga investors ay majority is nag benta na. Halos mga traders at mga umaasa nalang yung merong LUNC. Di na din maganda future niyan knowing na nag aayawan na sakanila ang mga investors at basag na basag na ang image nila sa crypto community. FOMO lang yung nag sasabi na mag $1 yan. Small play lang yung nangyari ngayon sa LUNC kaya umangat pero wag mag expect na lilipad pa yan hangang $1. If nag paplan palang sila, I don't think na tutulungan sila ng Binance kasi isa sila sa na hila ng pag lubog ng Terra at hindi sila mag bibigay ng oras sa mga alanganin na coin especially if may record na. So I think it will not happen.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Sobrang hype yan tungkol kay LUNC, yes malaki ang trading volume nya in the past few days pero sa tingin ko is part ito ng price manipulation nila and ng hype.Wag magexpect masyado tungkol kay LUNC, hanggat marame ang supply nito malabo ito mangyare. Pero if willing to hold naman and hinde naman gaano kalaki yung exposure mo sa LUNC, then you can still try even if there’s no guarantee.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: HYPE, and sa tinging ko masyadong risky if magiinvest ka at aasa ka na babalik ito sa $1 level.Marame ang naghahype ng project na ito since they are still trap and sa tingin ko, kung magiinvest ka dito better to wait for another update from them and alamin mo kung ok ba yung update or too good to be true. Binance is the biggest hodler for LUNC, kaya panigurado malaki paren ang influence nila sa pagpump nito. Maari parte sila ng hype and price manipulation nito kaya dapat magingat.

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: Quote from: samcrypto on February 12, 2023, 12:45:35 PMNow My question is, meron pa bang pagasa si LUNC to reach $1 or malaking hype lang ito? Sino dito ang naghohold paren ng LUNC and ano ang prediction mo dito? Considering its current supply, malabo mahit ang $1 pero if may magagandang updates at mas lalong napabilis ang burning system nila siguro in the next five years ay possible ito.I don't hold LUNC simula last year pero right now I'm considering to buy as well. Siguro kahit $100 lang ay kaya ko na itong ihold for the next 5 years. Risky yes, pero who knows? Baka talaga bumalik ang LUNC sa dati nitong presyo at pagnagkataon eh maging milyonaryo ren tayo. As long as ready ka sa risk, and hinde naman malaki yung pera na ilalagay mo, then why not try?

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Parang malabo umabot ng $100 yan. Pwede siguro mga tatlong decimal places pa yung price niya pero kung sa $1 ay hindi na talaga kakayanin. Unli supply kasi yan at ngayon kahit na magkaroon pa ng sosobrang gandang mga balita tungkol dyan at kahit may burning at tulong pa ng Binance, hindi na talaga kakayanin yan umabot pa sa ganyang price.

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Quote from: samcrypto on February 12, 2023, 12:45:35 PMWe all know what happened to LUNA last year, and despite of that meron paren ang naghahype sa LUNC especially now that they are planning to increase the burning system with a help of Binance. I have a few LUNC bought during the panic but got trap on this.Now My question is, meron pa bang pagasa si LUNC to reach $1 or malaking hype lang ito? Sino dito ang naghohold paren ng LUNC and ano ang prediction mo dito? May nag trade pa pala nito na mga pinoy kala ko kupas na ang hype nito  . Pero seriously di nako nag expect na mag $1 yan since sobrang dami nang traders ang natatakot mag hold ng coin na yan since napaka laking issue yung nangyari sa kanila at for sure low na confident ng mga tao na mag accumulate nyan. Siguro may pa ilan ilan nag te trade pero tingin ko day trading siguro ginagawa ng iba dyan, Pero kung balak mong mag invest dyan siguro maging maingat nalang sa decision making since risky coin to and prone for manipulation.
